About This App:
 This app is a cookbook app designed to allow users to access recipes without needing online connection or connection to a cellular network Originally aiming to use web scraping and a database to fill information out, I instead used that information to create in-app pages for offline access.


 NOTE: This current version of the app is meant for display purposes with a limited access to recipes for the sake of accessibility and speed, as well as physical device security. More recipes would be present in the full access application.

About Me: My name is Kyle Peterson, and I'm a computer science major from Sterling, Virginia, with plans to graduate this semester. I enjoy cooking, and prior to this semester I had zero android development experience. This project has proved challenging, yet a valuable learning experience.
